title: Bloomberg Markets: Cordier Sees Oil Dropping to $32 a Barrel
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cordier Sees Oil Dropping to $32 a Barrel
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: James Cordier Founder and President Optionsellers.Com Discussing oil market and a possible price of $32 per barrel by December as the lower demand shoulder season is approaching.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
